instructions: Rifts is a complicated game, and this is a complicated sheet. Please expand and review the instructions on each tab of the sheet in order to use it to its fullest. Happy gaming!

useroptions.displayname: Add PP bonus to Disarm and Entangle
useroptions.description: Add bonus from PP attribute to Disarm and Entangle, in addition to Strike/Parry/Dodge.
Rifter #13, p.16 describes a Perception bonus based on IQ. Checking this will factor in that bonus.

useroptions.displayname: Add Supernatural/Robotic punch damage to melee attacks
Apply PS damage to each hand in Paired attack
useroptions.description: If attacking using paired weapons, checking this will apply any PS bonus/Punch damage as applicable to each weapon in a Paired Weapons attack. Otherwise the PS damage is applied once to the total of both hands. If unchecked, this will also divide the PS damage by 2 when using Paired Weapons but only striking with one weapon.
